ovdesc.p: The Single Inward Bulk Standing Orders application is used to run the Inward Bulk Standing Orders application on-line.

The application allows one or more Inward Bulk Standing Orders to be executed. The User has to enter the ID of the Inward Bulk Standing Order/s which are to be processed. This corresponds to Field 0 ACCOUNT.NO.DATE from the Inward Bulk Standing Order file. The only Inward Bulk Standing Orders which may be run are those which have the date part of Field 0 less than or equal to today's date. Obviously the Inward Bulk Standing Order to be executed must be held on the Live Inward Bulk Standing Order file.

desc.p: Represents the ID of the Inward Bulk Standing Order/s which are to be run on-line.
Specifies the total amount of the Inward Bulk Standing Order defined in the previous field.
(Internal associated multivalue field.) Details: The contents of this field correspond to Field 4 TOTAL.CREDIT.AMOUNT of the Inward Bulk Standing Order file.

It is a sequential number which is updated every time when a history file is generated for the application SINGLE.INWARD.BULK.The history number will be updated in the id of the SINGLE.INWARD.BULK.HIST file.When a SINGLE.INWARD.BULK is verified for the first time the HIST.NO will be updated as 1.Every time it is verified 1 will be added to the HIST.NO field of existing record and this will be updated in the live SINGLE.INWARD.BULK file and the old record will be written to SINGLE.INWARD.BULK.HIST file
Identifies which Inward Bulk Standing Order is to be executed. It must be a valid ID in the Live Inward Bulk Standing Orders file.
The contents of this field must correspond to a valid entry on the Inward Bulk Standing Order file, this being Field 0 ACCOUNT.NO.DATE.

Up to 24 type A (alphanumeric) characters as follows: - The first part of the ID identifies the Account Number for which the Inward Bulk Standing Order has been defined. - The second part of the ID is separated from the Account Number by a '-' and will be a date. Associated multivalue field. (Mandatory input.)
Represents the number of payments, i.e. credits, of the Inward Bulk Standing Order defined in field 1.
